amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that electric plants can be considered reliable without having to enter into supply contracts that are greater than one year.
amendment.purpose: Amendment number 5 printed in House Report 114-359 to clarify that electric plants can be considered reliable without having to enter into supply contracts that are greater than one year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poliquin amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Poliquin.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poliquin amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
